name: Tower of Putrid Hate
description:
Arrow Key - Up, down, left, right

Z Key - Confirm

X Key - Cancel

On the planet Wealni, a group of people will band together to stop bad. 

The School of knowledge has sent you to find and track down the end of all life. A force that is slowly turning the souls of all rancid. The tower of putrid hate wishes for all life to end so he may replace it with something else.
